mods.name: Rayvens_Ammo
mods.author: Rayven
mods.description: Improved the damage output of obsidian arrow and cold steel ammo/arrows.

mods.name: Rayvens_Animal_Loot
mods.author: Rayven
mods.description: Added Super Cool Ice to boss loot table as well as red exotics.

mods.name: Rayvens_Better_Submachine_Gun
mods.author: Rayven
mods.description: Removed the negative stats and reduced the reload speed.

mods.name: Rayvens_Bigger_Pouches
mods.author: Rayven
mods.description: Increased slot size of pouches from 6 to 12.

mods.name: Rayvens_Difficulty
mods.author: Rayven
mods.description: Increased just the difficulty for hard.

mods.name: Rayvens_Legendaries
mods.author: Rayven
mods.description: Added animal highlight distance to most legendaries. Decreased reload speed on some legendaries, increased ammo capacity on some of them as well. Increased damage on biotech maul.

mods.name: Rayvens_Modules
mods.author: Rayven
mods.description: Buffed up some of the workshop modules.

mods.name: Rayvens_More_Stuff
mods.author: Rayven
mods.description: This version increases the 9MM Pistol fire rounds.

mods.name: Rayvens_Mounts
mods.author: Rayven
mods.description: Added Ubis Mount and Shaggy Zebra.

mods.name: Rayvens_Saddles
mods.author: Rayven
mods.description: This version adds heavy cargo slots to armored saddles. Bearhide and Racing have same stats; Basic saddles all share the DLC stats. Improved Laika Armor.

mods.name: Rayvens_Small_Fish_Lure
mods.author: Rayven
mods.description: Made a stand alone lure catch only small fish for the aquariums.

mods.name: Rayvens_Smelting_Speed
mods.author: Rayven
mods.description: This mod increases the smelting speed of the furnace that has the stoking the flames alteration.

mods.name: Rayvens_stacks_2.5k
mods.author: Rayven
mods.description: Added Zailfyers charcoal and ash to the list. Must be last to load on the list for this to work properly.

mods.name: Rayvens_Workshop
mods.author: Rayven
mods.description: Added chac pistol to the list, made changes to ammo capacity and reload speed.
